item.title: House committee issues subpoenas for Epstein files, depositions with Clintons and other officials
item.description: The House Oversight Committee subpoenaed the Justice Department on Tuesday for files in the sex trafficking investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Suncoast renters now must earn $35 an hour to afford a two-bedroom
item.description: Suncoast renters now must earn $35 an hour to afford a two-bedroom

item.title: State targets manatee protection case
item.description: The brief disputes that the Florida Department of Environmental Protection violated the law.

item.title: One year later: Residents say hard lessons learned after Tropical Storm Debby
item.description: “It’s hard, it’s really hard, people are just worn out, the energy is gone," one resident said.

item.title: Suspect captured in case of family’s quadruple homicide, baby abandoned in front yard
item.description: The suspect accused of murdering four family members in Northwest Tennessee on July 29 has been captured after a dayslong manhunt, Jackson Police Department confirms.

item.title: Death investigation underway in Nokomis after morning camper fire
item.description: One person was found dead. Criminal investigators are now handling the case.

item.title: AMI Turtle Watch urges caution during hatchling season
item.description: The Anna Maria Island Turtle Watch patrols the beach every morning.

item.title: Two arrested in North Port drug raid
item.description: The raid, called “Operation Bad Baby,” yielded two arrests and large cache of drugs and weapons.

item.title: 15th Annual Congressional Law Enforcement Awards
item.description: The 15th annual Congressional Law Enforcement Awards at 5:30 p.m.

item.title: TSA to add dedicated security line for families
item.description: TSA is working to make it easier for families to get through security at the airport.

item.title: Rain chances increasing into the weekend
Nokomis RV park ruled as arson; woman facing homicide charge
item.description: Neighbors said they heard a woman screaming, “Help me.”
